name: United We Stand (pkflunr)
description:
Project for Cal Poly Pomona Game Design and Development Club

You are the Unity Mage - Defeat foes and find new allies in your quest to defeat the Demon King!

Controls:
WASD - movement
Mouse Pointer - aim
Left Click - shoot
Space - recruit ally

The game is definitely still a prototype. Recruitable fallen enemies are a bit hard to discern, some animations are missing, the game is very imbalanced numbers-wise, and some sounds are missing or too loud. The menu screens are also temporary. Apologies!

Credits to be updated
